alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla and south central Leon Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 706 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles southwest of Tallahassee Community College to 7 miles southwest of Crawfordville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Hilliardville, Eight Mile Pond, Tully, Vereen, Plum Orchard, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach and Buckhorn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
